com.devwebsphere.wxsutils
Class ThreadLocalSession

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ThreadLocal<ThreadStuff>
      com.devwebsphere.wxsutils.ThreadLocalSession

public class ThreadLocalSession
extends java.lang.ThreadLocal<ThreadStuff>

Each WXSUtils instance uses a ThreadLocal to store a dedicated session for each thread.
